titleInfo.title: Hank Williams at the Canton Memorial Auditorium (signed)

mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (black and red on white) announcing Grand Ole Opry star Hank Williams and His Drifting Cowboys at the Canton Memorial Auditorium on New Year's Day, January 1, 1953. Poster features a metal photoplate of Hank Williams. Poster is signed by Don Helms, Hillous Butrum, Jerry Rivers, and Bob McNett.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
